org.apache.juneau.jena

Class N3Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContextable
        • org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseContext
          • org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
            • org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializer
              • org.apache.juneau.jena.RdfSerializer
                • org.apache.juneau.jena.N3Serializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationProvider, RdfMetaProvider, XmlMetaProvider

    public class N3Serializer
extends RdfSerializer
    Subclass of RdfSerializer for serializing RDF in N3 notation.
    • This class is thread safe and reusable.
    • Overview > juneau-marshall-rdf > RDF Details
